abstract: Honda and Toyota posted sharp decreases, while General Motors, Ford and Chrysler reported increases.
snippet: Honda and Toyota posted sharp decreases, while General Motors, Ford and Chrysler reported increases.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Sales of new vehicles in the United States rose in July but were still hampered by economic concerns and low inventories of many Japanese models.

headline.main: Despite Rising U.S. Sales, Automakers Are Struggling
headline.print_headline: Despite Rising U.S. Sales, Automakers Are Struggling
